name: Might Vs magic
description:
Fantasy Turn based strategy game where you are master of your town, you expand it so you can hire captains and army to conquer enemies or neutral territory. Is mini clone of popular game series Heroes of Might and Magic.

My new background game project that cost me a lot of time even in his simplest and basic version...

... so its have a lot of bug and AI is not working so I will try to fixed as soon possible but for now I need break.
